body_html: We don't have WatchOS devices on the team to test with, or experience with them, so it's not been something I've been able to easily add. I'd love to see this support added though, and from what I've looked at it should mostly be a case of different sdk paths and some clang and linker flags.

body: We don't have WatchOS devices on the team to test with, or experience with them, so it's not been something I've been able to easily add. I'd love to see this support added though, and from what I've looked at it should mostly be a case of different sdk paths and some clang and linker flags.
